**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 24, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 100 4.0, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 101 2.0, [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 42 1.1 --- A greater understanding of your magic broadens your range of simple spells. **Prepared Caster (Cleric, Wizard, etc.)**: You can prepare two additional cantrips each day.
**Spontaneous Caster (Bard, Sorcerer, etc.)**: Add two additional cantrips from your spell list to your repertoire.
